item.title: Measuring Internet Censorship in Cuba's ParkNets
item.description: Image by Arturo Filast√≤ (CC-BY-SA-3.0) A research study by the Open Observatory of Network Interference (OONI) View the pdf version of the report here. Table of contents Key Findings Introduction Background Network landscape and internet penetration ETECSA ParkNets Joven Club StreetNets El Paquete Summary Measuring Internet Censorship in Cuba Methodology Collection and analysis of ooniprobe network measurements
